amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding to the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy for the purposes of offshore wind job training grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to increase funding to the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy for the purposes of offshore wind job training grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 217 (Roll no. 244).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Tsongas.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 217 (Roll no. 244).
